maybe_die.Name: Rick
maybe_die.Text: There is a long way to the first floor.

maybe_die.Name: Rick
maybe_die.Text: Maybe I should end this suffering....

maybe_die.Name: Rick
maybe_die.Text: I MUST CATCH MARTIN AND VANESSA!

first_enter.Name: Rick
first_enter.Text: I can not believe I have escaped the police. They need to try harder to catch me!

first_enter.Name: Rick
first_enter.Text: I need to get to the Martin's computer to the top floor! Maybe I can find some evidence!

police_first.Name: Police
police_first.Text: We saw him enter the building. We will capture him.

police_first.Name: Rick
police_first.Text: If I have close the lights, I can infiltrate better.

police_no_light.Name: Police
police_no_light.Text: Where are the lights? We need to turn them on.

police_no_light.Name: Rick
police_no_light.Text: Good. Now it will be easier to get to the top floor.

police_present.Name: Rick
police_present.Text: Oh no! There is a cop. I must be careful

police_present.Name: Rick
police_present.Text: He must not see me, otherwise I will go to jail.

police_present.Name: Police
police_present.Text: Maybe these platforms can help. I think if I step on them, they will be destroyed

elevator_no_key.Name: Rick
elevator_no_key.Text: What? Elevator is broken? Damn you, Martin

first_ninja.Name: Rick
first_ninja.Text: Oh no! There is a cop. I need to go behind the cop

first_ninja.Name: Rick
first_ninja.Text: I need to activate my Ninja skills.

exit_ninja.Name: Rick
exit_ninja.Text: Blind cop. I am the best ninja ever!

exit_ninja.Name: Rick
exit_ninja.Text: How is he sleeping standing up?! Useless cops!

evidence.Name: Rick
evidence.Text: Ok. This is his computer. Lucky me, it is not locked. Let's see....

evidence.Name: Martin
evidence.Text: Are you sure about this? It is very risky to kill Edwarda...

evidence.Name: Vanessa
evidence.Text: Don't worry, baby. My brother is very dumb. We will get away and be very rich!

evidence.Name: Martin
evidence.Text: That's right baby! I love it when you are evil!

evidence.Name: Rick
evidence.Text: Gross! How was i married to this woman?

evidence.Name: Rick
evidence.Text: These mails are good. I hope they are good enough. I need to go to court.
